title.rendered: District Saddened By Loss Of Dorothy Nolan Staff Member

content.rendered:
The district is saddened to learn about the passing of Jackie Bruce, a dedicated keyboard specialist, who worked at Dorothy Nolan Elementary School.  Her commitment to her work and her kind and compassionate nature will be missed by her colleagues and the entire school community.

A funeral service in her honor will be held at 2:00 p.m. on Saturday, October 14th at Compassionate Funeral Care, 402 Maple Avenue, Saratoga Springs.  Friends and colleagues may pay their respects during calling hours that are scheduled from 12:00 p.m. to 2:00 p.m. prior to the service at the funeral home.
